column1: Smoque BBQ////My girlfriend and I shared 1/2 lb. of sliced brisket
column5: mac & cheese and cole slaw. All of the meats had great flavor. Â The mac & cheese was great
column6: as well. The fries were fine. The cole slaw was pretty mediocre but it's just cole slaw so it doesn't really matter. Staff was friendly. Came out to about $38 for all the food and 2 drinks which is about par for the course when it comes to quality bbq. They don't serve alcohol
